title: Weekend Getaways in Northern California - Guide...
text:
Thanks for sharing About.com with others! Most Emailed Articles Northern California Weekend Getaways Near You Interactive Weekend Getaway Locator Map 
Use this map to find weekend getaways close to where you live. For any place name shown in bold , click on the name to find the weekend getaway planner for it. 
Sign up for a free weekly newsletter dedicated to California getaways and you'll get new ideas delivered straight to your inbox every week. More California Weekend Getaways
